nextCommand() - Method in class game.ClientPlayer

Reads the "in" mailbox for the command deposited there by the remote machine.
nextCommand() - Method in class game.HumanPlayer
During normal play, reads in commands from the current System.in input and parses them into command strings that correspond to the expected commands.
nextCommand() - Method in class game.MachinePlayer
Either reads input from the terminal in the same manner as the HumanPlayer if we are in setup or finished state, or asks the A.I.
nextCommand() - Method in class game.Player
The next command or move from THIS.
nextTurn() - Method in class game.Game
Sets the current turn (color of the next move) to the other player (other player's color).
NullCommand - Class in game
Represents an empty string input.
NullCommand() - Constructor for class game.NullCommand
